cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
This is an immaculate 2013 Nissan Juke with only 3700 miles on it. Cloth Seats, power nothing.
This is an immaculate 2008 Volkswagen Golf with only 60000 miles on it. Leather seats, power steering, windows, and aluminum wheels.
